LanguageData.Gun_Cattleman_Westerado.label: cattleman
LanguageData.Gun_Cattleman_Westerado.description: An ancient pattern single-action revolver. It's not very powerful, but has a decent range for a pistol and is quick on the draw.
LanguageData.Gun_Cattleman_Westerado.tools.0.label: grip
LanguageData.Gun_Cattleman_Westerado.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_Cattleman_Westerado.label: cattleman bullet
LanguageData.Gun_BreakActionRevolver_Westerado.label: break-action revolver
LanguageData.Gun_BreakActionRevolver_Westerado.descri: An ancient pattern break-action revolver. It's not very powerful, but has a decent range for a pistol and a relatively quick reload.
LanguageData.Gun_PercussionRevolver_Westerado.label: percussion revolver
LanguageData.Gun_PercussionRevolver_Westerado.descrip: An ancient pattern percussion-lock revolver. It's quite powerful, has a decent range and is quick on the draw.
LanguageData.Gun_NavyRevolver_Westerado.label: rebel revolver
LanguageData.Gun_NavyRevolver_Westerado.description: An ancient pattern single-action revolver. It's not very powerful, but has a decent range for a pistol and is quick on the draw.
LanguageData.Gun_NavyRevolver_Westerado.tools.0.label: grip
LanguageData.Gun_NavyRevolver_Westerado.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_NavyRevolver_Westerado.label: rebel revolver bullet
LanguageData.Gun_DoubleActionRevolver_Westerado.label: double-action revolver
LanguageData.Gun_DoubleActionRevolver_Westerado.descr: An ancient pattern double-action revolver. It's not very powerful, but has a decent range for a pistol and has a decent rate of fire.
LanguageData.Gun_LeverActionPistol_Westerado.label: lever-action pistol
LanguageData.Gun_LeverActionPistol_Westerado.descript: An ancient pattern lever-action pistol. It's not very powerful, but has a decent range for a pistol and has a decent rate of fire.
LanguageData.Bullet_LeverActionPistol_Westerado.label: lever-action pistol bullet
LanguageData.Gun_BroomhandlePistol_Westerado.label: broomhandle pistol
LanguageData.Gun_BroomhandlePistol_Westerado.descript: An ancient pattern blowback-operated self-loading pistol. It lacks stopping power and range, but is quick to fire.
LanguageData.Bullet_BroomhandlePistol_Westerado.label: broomhandle bullet
LanguageData.Gun_FlintlockPistol_Westerado.label: flintlock pistol
LanguageData.Gun_FlintlockPistol_Westerado.descriptio: Ancient pistol design. Popular with admirals and pirates alike. Good stopping power, but slow to fire and has bad accuracy at range.
LanguageData.Bullet_FlintlockPistol_Westerado.label: flintlock pistol bullet
LanguageData.Gun_PercussionPistol_Westerado.label: percussion pistol
LanguageData.Gun_PercussionPistol_Westerado.descripti: Ancient pistol design. Good stopping power, but slow to fire and has bad accuracy at range.
LanguageData.Bullet_PercussionPistol_Westerado.label: percussion pistol bullet
LanguageData.Gun_BoltActionPistol_Westerado.label: bolt-action pistol
LanguageData.Gun_BoltActionPistol_Westerado.descripti: An ancient pattern bolt-action pistol. Medium range, and low fire rate.
LanguageData.Bullet_BoltActionPistol_Westerado.label: bolt-action rifle bullet
LanguageData.Gun_HarlowRevolver_Westerado.label: harlow's revolver
LanguageData.Gun_HarlowRevolver_Westerado.description: Allegedely the revolver used by the legendary 'Harlow'.
LanguageData.Bullet_HarlowRevolver_Westerado.label: harlow's revolver bullet
LanguageData.Gun_CoachGun_Westerado.label: coach gun
LanguageData.Gun_CoachGun_Westerado.description: An ancient design of double barrelled shotgun that emits a tight-packed spray of pellets. Deadly, but short range, and slow rate of fire.
LanguageData.Gun_CoachGun_Westerado.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.Gun_CoachGun_Westerado.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_CoachGun_Westerado.label: coach gun blast
LanguageData.Gun_CoachGunSawed_Westerado.label: sawed-off coach gun
LanguageData.Gun_CoachGunSawed_Westerado.description: An ancient design of double barrelled shotgun that emits a tight-packed spray of pellets. Deadly, but short range, and slow rate of fire. Sacrifices accuracy at long range for being more wieldy.
LanguageData.Bullet_CoachGunSawed_Westerado.label: sawed-off coach gun blast
LanguageData.Gun_BreakActionShotgun_Westerado.label: break-action shotgun
LanguageData.Gun_BreakActionShotgun_Westerado.descrip: An ancient design of double barrelled shotgun that emits a tight-packed spray of pellets. Deadly, but short range, and slow rate of fire.
LanguageData.Gun_TrenchPumpShotgun_Westerado.label: trench gun
LanguageData.Gun_TrenchPumpShotgun_Westerado.descript: An ancient design of pump shotgun that emits a tight-packed spray of pellets. Deadly, but short range.
LanguageData.Bullet_TrenchPumpShotgun_Westerado.label: shotgun blast
LanguageData.Gun_LeverActionShotgun_Westerado.label: lever-action shotgun
LanguageData.Gun_LeverActionShotgun_Westerado.descrip: An ancient design of lever-action shotgun that emits a tight-packed spray of pellets. Deadly, but short range, decent rate-of-fire.
LanguageData.Gun_LeverActionShotgunSawed_Westerado.de: An ancient design of lever-action shotgun that emits a tight-packed spray of pellets. Deadly, but short range, decent rate-of-fire. Sacrifices accuracy at long range for being more wieldy.
LanguageData.Gun_MaresLegShotgun_Westerado.label: mare's leg shotgun
LanguageData.Gun_MaresLegShotgun_Westerado.descriptio: An ancient design of lever-action shotgun that emits a tight-packed spray of pellets. Deadly, but short range, decent rate-of-fire. Sacrifices accuracy at long range for being generally awesome.
LanguageData.Bullet_MaresLegShotgun_Westerado.label: mare's leg blast
LanguageData.Gun_MusketRifle_Westerado.label: musket rifle
LanguageData.Gun_MusketRifle_Westerado.description: An ancient pattern musket rifle. Has a decent range, but a very low fire rate. When it finds its target it packs quite the punch.
LanguageData.Gun_MusketRifle_Westerado.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.Gun_MusketRifle_Westerado.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_MusketRifle_Westerado.label: musket rifle bullet
LanguageData.Gun_MusketRifleBayonet_Westerado.label: bayoneted musket rifle
LanguageData.Gun_MusketRifleBayonet_Westerado.descrip: An ancient pattern musket rifle with a bayonet. Has a decent range, but a very low fire rate. When it finds its target it packs quite the punch.
LanguageData.Gun_MusketRifleDecorated_Westerado.label: decorated musket rifle
LanguageData.Gun_MusketRifleDecorated_Westerado.descr: An ancient pattern musket rifle, decorated by First Nation tribes. Has a decent range, but a very low fire rate. When it finds its target it packs quite the punch.
LanguageData.Gun_PercussionRifle_Westerado.label: percussion rifle
LanguageData.Gun_PercussionRifle_Westerado.descriptio: An ancient pattern percussion lock rifle. Decent range, and low fire rate.
LanguageData.Bullet_PercussionRifle_Westerado.label: percussion rifle bullet
LanguageData.Gun_BreechblockRifle_Westerado.label: breechblock rifle
LanguageData.Gun_BreechblockRifle_Westerado.descripti: An ancient pattern breech-block rifle. With its long range, and somewhat low fire rate, it is good for the aspiring marksman.
LanguageData.Bullet_BreechblockRifle_Westerado.label: breechblock rifle bullet
LanguageData.Gun_RepeatingRifle_Westerado.label: repeating rifle
LanguageData.Gun_RepeatingRifle_Westerado.description: A general-purpose lever-action rifle for field or urban combat. It has good range, decent power, and good accuracy.
LanguageData.Bullet_RepeatingRifle_Westerado.label: repeating rifle bullet
LanguageData.Gun_RepeatingRifleDecorated_Westerado.de: A general-purpose lever-action rifle for field or urban combat, decorated by First Nation tribes. It has good range, decent power, and good accuracy.
LanguageData.Gun_BoltActionSniperRifle_Westerado.desc: Ancient pattern bolt-action rifle with sniper optics. Very long range, good accuracy and power, low rate of fire.
LanguageData.Gun_BreechblockSniperRifle_Westerado.des: Ancient pattern breechblock rifle with long-range optics. Long range, good accuracy and power, very low rate of fire.
